description: This file implements a Visual Studio Code extension that registers a webview panel for 'Ollama Chat'. It defines the activation and deactivation functions, registers a view provider for the chat UI, and a command to open the chat view.

classes.name: WebviewViewProvider implementation
classes.description: An inline class implementing vscode.WebviewViewProvider that sets up the webview HTML content for the Ollama Chat extension.

methods.name: export function activate(context: vscode.ExtensionContext) { activate
methods.description: Initializes the extension by registering the webview view provider and command to open the chat UI.

methods.name: resolveWebviewView
methods.description: Configures the webview panel when it is created, setting HTML content for the chat interface.

methods.name: export function deactivate() { deactivate
methods.description: Function called when the extension is deactivated; currently a no-op.
